name: HomestaysDOS.com
overview:
HomestaysDOS.com is the leading website for the Rental of Holiday Homes and Vacation Homes in India. Owners of Vacation Properties register their homes on the website and travelers can visit the website and connect with them. The company offers a secure messaging system and a verified money transfer capability to ensure that buyers and sellers are protected. HomestaysDOS.com is partnered with most of the leading Online Travel Agents as well as over 100 of India’s leading travel agencies.

The website was founded by Roshan D’Silva - when looking for ways to generate additional income from Coffee Plantations owned by his parents. It is among a new wave of web 2.0 startups in India that have grown primarily through word of mouth on a bootstrapped budget.

external_links.title: Staying at homes - the new travel option
